analytic.title: Tracing the Reception of the Protoevangelium of James in Late Antique Arabia: The Case of the Poetry of Umayya ibn Abī aṣ-Ṣalt and Its Intersection with the Quran

monogr.title: Religious Culture in Late Antique Arabia: Selected Studies on the Late Antique Religious Mind

body.bibl: Horn, Cornelia B. “Tracing the Reception of the Protoevangelium of James in Late Antique Arabia: The Case of the Poetry of Umayya Ibn Abī Aṣ-Ṣalt and Its Intersection with the Quran.” In Religious Culture in Late Antique Arabia: Selected Studies on the Late Antique Religious Mind, edited by Kirill Dmitriev and Isabel Toral-Niehoff, 123–46. Islamic History and Thought 6. Piscataway, New Jersey: Gorgias Press, 2017.
